summary: Patches to maintain compatibility between Advanced Adversary Encounters and other popular mods.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][center][color=#1e84cc]Advanced Adversary Encounters Patches[/color][/center][/size][/b][size=3][b][center]Various patches to maintain compatibility between Advanced Adversary Encounters and other popular mods.[/center][/b][/size]

[center][b]Advanced Adversary Encounters [/b][i]by Tx12001[/i][b] [/b]
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64690/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64690/?[/url][/u][/center]
[b][size=4]
There are 27 patches currently available for the following mods: [/size][/b]
[b]
[/b]
